Player History
Drafted in 25th round, 390th overall pick, by New York in 2015...
Injured on 4/5/2015 with a Torn Rib Cage Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 6/3/2017 with a Bruised Hand, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/15/2017 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2018, off Hong Shaw (BRO)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/24/2018, off Jeffrey Horne (SLB)...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2018, hitting .297 with 14 HR, 63 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2019, hitting .423 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2019, hitting .333 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2020, hitting .536 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Boston on 5/24/2020...
